project.name: MapComplete Open Artwork Map
project.description: Welcome to Open Artwork Map, a map of statues, busts, grafittis and other artwork all over the world

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Open Artwork Map has a layer Artworks showing features with this tag

The layer 'Artworks allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Artworks allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Artworks allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Artworks allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'Artworks' shows and asks freeform values for key 'artwork_type' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=architecture with a fixed text, namely 'Architecture' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=mural with a fixed text, namely 'Mural' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=painting with a fixed text, namely 'Painting' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=sculpture with a fixed text, namely 'Sculpture' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=statue with a fixed text, namely 'Statue' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=bust with a fixed text, namely 'Bust' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=stone with a fixed text, namely 'Stone' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=installation with a fixed text, namely 'Installation' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=graffiti with a fixed text, namely 'Graffiti' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=relief with a fixed text, namely 'Relief' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')

Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=azulejo with a fixed text, namely 'Azulejo (Spanish decorative tilework)' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows artwork_type=tilework with a fixed text, namely 'Tilework' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows and asks freeform values for key 'artist_name' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows and asks freeform values for key 'website' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
Layer 'Artworks' shows and asks freeform values for key 'wikidata' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Artwork Map')
